name: TetrisInvaders
description:
TetrisInvaders

Welcome Pilot. The TetrisInvaders are heading to Earth! You are humanity's last hope.

Use your bullets to reshape the incoming blocks so that they form complete lines behind you and clear.

Leave your highest score in the comments:

  • Destroy a single block: 1 point
  • Clear a vertical line of blocks: 500 points
  • Clear multiple lines of blocks at once: 500 + 1000 (2nd line) + 1500 (3rd line) ... points!

~ Controls ~

  • Left/Right/Up/Down Arrows - Fly your spaceship
  • Z/X - Shoot

This game was made over a weekend for the Mini Jam 71 - combining two genres at once.
